dogecoin.text:
@APompliano @Bitcoin @ethereum @dogecoin @GOP @TeamTrump @JDVance @elonmusk @DavidSacks @shaunmmaguire @SpaceX @realDonaldTrump @DonaldTrump @pmarca @imPenny2x @WholeMarsBlog @cb_doge So you don't know that @Bitcoin is out of the woods yet. The @GOP plans involving #cryptocurrency might totally upset the applecart and leave $BTC stranded, M. @APompliano. You simply don't know.

~Mono the Unicorn 🦄

@APompliano @Bitcoin @ethereum @dogecoin @GOP @TeamTrump @JDVance @elonmusk @DavidSacks @shaunmmaguire @SpaceX @realDonaldTrump @DonaldTrump @pmarca @imPenny2x @WholeMarsBlog @cb_doge But the difficulty now, M. @APompliano, is that you have no idea what the @GOP might do after #InaugurationDay, with #cryptocurrency or anything else. They are an *unknown* that you can't reason out of—how do you reason with fanatics who don't keep promises? It's not easy!

~Mono

@APompliano @Bitcoin @ethereum @dogecoin @GOP @TeamTrump @JDVance @elonmusk @DavidSacks @shaunmmaguire @SpaceX @realDonaldTrump @DonaldTrump @pmarca Indeed that's one reason that M. @imPenny2x and M. @WholeMarsBlog and M. @cb_doge and other superfans of M. @elonmusk love him so much: they secretly wish they could do the same thing just as freely, i.e. betray others and cheat on deals and go back on awkward promises.

~Mono 🦄

@APompliano @Bitcoin @ethereum @dogecoin @GOP @TeamTrump @JDVance @elonmusk @DavidSacks @shaunmmaguire @SpaceX @realDonaldTrump @DonaldTrump M. @elonmusk and Trump and M. @pmarca and other such persons, M. @APompliano, always imagine they're being very intelligent and sly when they betray folks, "leaving them guessing" as they might say, although I suspect they're actually quite predictable and clumsy about it.

~Mono

@APompliano @Bitcoin @ethereum @dogecoin @GOP @TeamTrump @JDVance @elonmusk @DavidSacks @shaunmmaguire @SpaceX That's the problem with putting chaotic authoritarians into power, M. @APompliano. People like M. @realDonaldTrump (or M. @DonaldTrump) and M. @elonmusk gain what little power they have largely from being *unpredictable*, breaking promises and betraying others. 

~Mono 🦄

@APompliano @Bitcoin @ethereum @dogecoin @GOP @TeamTrump @JDVance @elonmusk @DavidSacks @shaunmmaguire In fact, M. @APompliano, it's highly likely that only ONE #cryptocurrency will benefit from @GOP political alliance, because that tends to be what governmental involvement does to a #market: it collapses it down to a virtual #monopoly, as has happened with @elonmusk's @SpaceX.

@APompliano @Bitcoin @ethereum @dogecoin @GOP @TeamTrump @JDVance @elonmusk @DavidSacks @shaunmmaguire And even if the @GOP does formally legitimize #cryptocurrency, M. @APompliano, that will mean an ugly *new* fight breaking out among the current #CryptoCommunity, jostling for a slice of influence with the Trump government. Only a very few people will benefit from that.

~Mono 🦄

@APompliano @Bitcoin @ethereum @dogecoin @GOP @TeamTrump @JDVance @elonmusk That's IF the @GOP decides to go along with whatever promises they've made to M. @elonmusk and M. @DavidSacks and M. @shaunmmaguire and other speculators in the #BlockchainRevolution. @TeamTrump may yet decide to cut them loose; not all Republicans believe in high-tech promises.

@APompliano @Bitcoin @ethereum @dogecoin @GOP All the slender #hope of the #CryptoTrading speculators, M. @APompliano, rest on the incoming @GOP government of @TeamTrump. If Trump and M. @JDVance and M. @elonmusk arrange for special government protections of #cryptocurrency transactions, then the fad will have paid off.

@APompliano What if the entire #cryptocurrency fad collapses, M. @APompliano? It's still a #bubble as you know, inflated purely by speculative excitement, and such excitement cannot be sustained forever. Right now the last hope of @Bitcoin and @ethereum and @dogecoin is for @GOP support.
